FindCoord - Find Coordinates based on previous analysis

findcoord.transform module¶

class findcoord.transform.Transformation(Input, Output)¶

Bases: object

Class that allows to compute the transformation of coordinates given some landmarks between two systems.

extract_mesures_final()¶

Write the calculated coordinates into the output textfile

get_mesures_init()¶

Return a dataframe of the points to transform from the input

get_repere_final()¶

Return a dataframe of the output landmarks

get_repere_init()¶

Return a dataframe of the input landmarks

get_transform_matrix()¶

Return the array of the transformation matrix

get_transform_repere()¶

Return the transformation of the Landmarks done by the matrix. Usefull to compare the the true and the calculated landmarks

transform(type='Proj')¶

In our working cases the transformation should only be affine (Rotation,Translation and Shear). But in general cases, the transformation could also have deformation and the transformation is a projection. See Mathematical definition of affine transformation and Projection (Homography) for more details.
